content.detailedDescription: Driving home from yuba city my girlfriend and i were on old adobe road in petaluma around 11:55 pm on december 13th of 2008.  as i was driving i looked out the driver side window to see a glowing blue cigar shaped object floating in the sky.  as i looked on the object descended rapidly towards the ground and then ascended rapidly and leveled out.  this movement reminded me of roller coaster.  as the object descended its color started changing to white and as it leveled out the object was completely white.  once the object was leveled it remained in the sky for a second and then flew off at a great speed and disappeared.  the object appeared to stretch as it flew off.  when i had first spotted the object, i thought it was a shooting star until it started to descend.  after witnessing this, i asked my girlfriend if she had just seen the object and she said no that she had been looking out the other window.
content.summary: Glowing blue cigar shaped object dived in air and ascended quickly. as object ascended it turned white and flashed and then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: At the exact time given, when i was walking to work down by the deschutes river, i noticed a large white light that was traveling from where venus was located southwest in a straight line towards the northeast. it traveled slow, there were no flashing air traffic lights at all!! no sound! i have seen the space station one time and this was similar but the space station had travel exactly from west to east. could somebody verify if this was the space station? my coworker had also witnessed the same object as i did.
content.summary: Large white light (no flashing lights....Was this the space station???).

content.detailedDescription:
in ne florida last night at dusk, directly above my yard just above the trees, a craft with blinking red lights , apx 8 of them, shaped like a v < like a boomerang shape outlined by the lights, came out of nowhere. 
it was very clear and still light out, just at dusk and i was observing venus in the sw and sirius in the se , moments before there was nothing in the sky .. i'm sure because i was amazed at how clear it was. then suddenly this object was there right above me moving very slowly , i thought it was a plane at first but it was odd.. i couldn't see the body of it although it was right there about 20 ft above me and not quite dark , i couldn't see the sky or any stars through it either, so something was there but nothing i could make out.. it was like lights on a shadow. 

i couldn't understand what i was seeing the whole time for about 3 minutes  it was right there and moving very slowly but all i could really 'see' were the red lights blinking , i was stunned and frozen there but not really afraid , kind of in a daze .. no one was home (of course) to share this with .. it was moving sooo slowly , i kept trying to focus on it to see what it was , that's the odd part.. if it was a plane that close i could have seen the pilot or windows or something ! it took so long to move , 3 minutes to cross my yard (150ft) then  went over my neighbors house and then just disappeared . a plane would have been easily visible for miles going in that direction (east toward the ocean). there has never been a plane here that low or ever one moving in that direction and i look at the sky alot ! 

there was a whooshing sound which didn't make sense to me , it seems that something that large and close would make a much louder and different sound. it didn't seem that the sound was actually connected with it.. very hard to explain.. thanks for listening !
content.summary: Large, low flying triangle shaped , red lights apx 20ft above house over backyard in ne florida at dusk.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and out of the corner of my eye i saw a green light. i looked out the window and saw what looked like a bright lime green ball of fire. it appeared to be just hanging there and then it disappeared from my sight. i ran to the next room to see where it went but it was gone.
content.summary: Bright lime green ball of fire.

content.detailedDescription: We were on our apartment balcony when my wife noticed a red light that had twinkles of light falling from the main red light.  it also shined a bright white light occasionally.  my wife, kids and i observed it for several minutes... the object started to move away north towards the mountains.  i decided to get in my vehicle to see if i can get a closer look.  i traveled north on milliken ave towards the mountains keeping the object in site.  as i reached the top of milliken the object was directly over the mountain and was shining some type of search light on to the mountain.  i could actually see the mountain side light up.  the craft's light at this point was white... i could make out three point of lights and the beam of light pointing down on the mountain.  it remained in the same spot for approximately 5 minutes.  the search light turned off after a couple minutes and the object almost seemed as if it had parked.  i then noticed another red light emerge to my right just a couple hundred feet to the east of the initial object.  the red light traveled to east slowly and then south.  i once again got in my vehicle to get a closer look.  i traveled south on milliken towards foothill but could not get a close enough.  i proceeded to head back north on milliken to see if the other object was still there... i could see it from a distance.  this time it was a solid greenish blue type color.  as i am getting closer towards the top of milliken it starts to travel east.  as i reached the top of milliken i was parallel with the object.  it couldn���t have been more than a couple hundred feet away and the object was flying really low to the ground.  it did not make any noise.  the greenish blue object was surrounded by blinking strobe lights.  i would say at least 8-12 different strobes.  the object traveled east then seemed to remain stationary for about 10 minutes.  i observed it along with 3 other similar lights for a good 10 minutes off to the east.  it was not moving.  i tried to get a closer look and proceeded east toward the city of fontana.  every time i would seem to get closer it would start to move away.  i traveled all the way to sierra ave in fontana.  the lights got further away so i decided to head back home.  at my closest proximity to the object on the top of milliken i would estimate the object to be no bigger than a goodyear blimp.  it was difficult to make out due to all the strobe lights around the greenish blue light.  as my family and i observed this object my sister in law and her husband viewed the object as well and traveled to the top of hellman drive and also observed the beam of light it omitted onto the mountain.
content.summary: Alternating center light (green, blue, red, white, yellow) strobe lights in a circular pattern all around the center light.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was outside my house, i just stepped outside for a smoke with a friend, its was 9:30 pm and the sky was clear.
2.  i looked up because i heard a large plane flying over, like a normal large passenger plane, which is normal, they fly overhead all the time, but there was also a large (3xs bigger than the jet) triangular craft following close behind.  i say it was triangular because it had a white light on each tip of the triangle, and one large blinking red light in the center.
3.  i thought maybe it was a stealth bomber because of its shape.
4.  as i watched the craft, it seemed to slow down, then it twisted/spun slowly on its side and changed from the triangular shape (based on the 3 white lights i mentioned above) into a rectangular shape (now it had 4 white lights and the red blinking light disappeared).  it remained a rectangular shape for a few seconds (maybe 15 seconds), slowly twisting the entire time, and then it "split" or separated into 2 separate crafts.  
5.  i was excited.
6.  the objects remained moving east from me until i lost sight of it over a mountain range.
content.summary: Witnessed a triangular craft change into a rectangle and then split into 2 crafts.

content.detailedDescription:
Cnn has put together a 3d photosynth presentation of the inauguration: 

http://www.Cnn.Com/specials/2009/44.President/inauguration/themoment/

in the sky, to the left and behind the capital dome, are what appear to be circular objects.

please see attached photos.
content.summary: Objects in sky over inauguration venue.

content.detailedDescription: lost of peoples see on the sky this objets at 8;10pm i n temiscamingue area in quebec and ontario,(new liskeard,matheson.Crash on the ground,may bee.Sorry an french man am try print an speak english.For more information please contact the radio channel ,ckvm fm 93,1 (819)-629-2710.Email address (ckvm@ckvm.Qc.Ca) web site(www.Ckvm.Qc.Ca
content.summary: Big flash on the sky crash on the ground (make a little tremor ).

content.detailedDescription: I had just return home from work i decided to log on to cnn.Com and clicked barac obama i saw an article that said double message to muslimi click it and as i watch the analysts discus the topic, i saw somethingzip pass the screen from the right, i said to myself what was that so iplayed it back and was able to stop the video and zoom in, and to see��� the object looked disc or cigar shape moving at a high rate of speed. this was hugh for me i've always been believer and to see this was icingon the cake. go to cnn.Com judge for yourself.
content.summary: I saw ufo on video.

content.detailedDescription:
Since june 2008, i have witnessed approximately twenty unusual sightings in the area of westlake, louisiana (calcasieu parish/county).

unusual sightings to date include larger than normal appearing/disappearing daytime and nighttime starlike objects that are sometimes stationary or moving rapidly and always just blink out of sight in an instant. other sightings include stationary round ball like objects (silver & gray) that do not move in the wind and then blink out of sight instantly. (one accelerated from a dead stop to a speed barely visible to the eye). a couple of sightings appeared to be similar to nighttime aircraft with landing lights on and more than a dozen strobes, except the craft remained motionless in the sky for several minutes and then moved very slowly with no sound present. all sightings were observed during clear skies.

the latest sighting follows:

on 01/20/09, i went outside at 9:00pm to throw some grapefruit rinds on my garden compost pile. as i looked due west, i observed a large stationary flame yellow round object about 30 degrees above the horizon. the object had a smoky appearance to it in the totally clear sky and appeared to be about ten times larger than venus. as i dumped the grapefruit rinds on the compost pile the neighbors dog started a ruckus, so i went back inside to let him calm down. about ten minutes later, i went back outside to look at the stationary object in the sky and it was gone.
content.summary: More sightings in westlake, louisiana.

content.detailedDescription:
Since june 2008, i have witnessed approximately twenty unusual sightings in the area of westlake, louisiana (calcasieu parish/county).

unusual sightings to date include larger than normal appearing/disappearing daytime and nighttime starlike objects that are sometimes stationary or moving rapidly and always just blink out of sight in an instant. other sightings include stationary round ball like objects (silver & gray) that do not move in the wind and then blink out of sight instantly. (one accelerated from a dead stop to a speed barely visible to the eye). a couple of sightings appeared to be similar to nighttime aircraft with landing lights on and more than a dozen strobes, except the craft remained motionless in the sky for several minutes and then moved very slowly with no sound present. all sightings were observed during clear skies.

the latest sighting follows:

on 12/30/08, i observed what appeared to be a small military fighter jet flying low over town at 3:40pm. (military aircraft are rare here, however three earlier sightings were followed quickly by the appearance of military aircraft). after eating dinner, i went outside at 4:30pm and counted eight contrails in the sky at one time. i figured i missed the show as 2-3 contrails are normally the most seen at once around here in six months of skywatching.

the next day (12/31/08), i went outside at 4:00pm and soon saw a very high large dark colored jet (possibly a b-52) flying overhead heading east leaving a contrail. as i watched the jet nearly straight overhead, i observed what i thought was something dropping off the aircraft. the object that appeared to separate from the jet appeared to be a silver ball about 1/3 the size of the jet. the object appeared to be sightly lower than the jet and it���������s contrail and was stationary in the sky for over five minutes with a 5-10 mph wind coming from the south at ground level. i could not tell if the object actually came from the jet or just appeared very near it when i first observed it. i observed the object with 5x binoculars, and it still appeared to be a high altitude stationary silver ball. i attempted to videotape the object but i was not able to locate it in the viewfinder before it disappeared.
content.summary: Sightings continue in westlake, louisiana.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw three lights low on the horizon, looking north off of my balcony near wasilla, alaska at around 7:15pm alaska time on jan. 20th, 2009.  i frequently go outside at night to watch the stars and i noticed this set of lights, which weren't supposed to be there.

the lights changed in intensity and changed position as if they were attached to something.  when i first saw them, they were a perfect triangle.  they moved to form an elongated triangle pointing east, then reoriented again.

i didn't hear any noises.  what seemed to be the "center" light was brighter than the other two.  the center light was brightest when oriented head on, forming almost a straight line, then turned again, becoming a smaller looking triangle.

it didn't move quickly enough to be distinct, if that makes any sense.  but they definitely moved quickly enough as to change the arrangement of the lights within 10-15 seconds.  

i called my girlfriend out to see them, but all we could see was the center light.  then, they began to move again and the triangle was visible.  i called her back out and she saw it, too.  she said it was creepy.

at first, i thought they might be helicopters flying in formation.  there were no other blinking lights, but they did "twinkle" like stars, which is what made it seem so strange.

i am not an avid ufo enthusiast, but i do like to watch the stars.  this is the first time i have seen anything like this.  i do remember watching something on the science channel about triangular lights which behaved exactly like these did about a month prior to this event.  i don't think that influenced what i saw, but it definitely made me watch them closer.

after about 15 minutes of watching (it was fairly chilly), i came inside to check if there had been any reports.  i didn't really know where to look, though, and i found this site through a google search on how to report sightings.  

when i went back outside to continue watching, the lights were gone, as far as i could tell.
content.summary: Triangle, low on horizon, changed orientation.

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out side to smoke and saw this bright flashing blue green red pulsing object in the eastern sky above town.

also 3 others people watched this with me.

i am a trained ex-police officer and have never seen anything like this.
the object moved, well it still is right now..Very slowly in a west south west.

none of us that are watching this thing have ever seen anything like it.

it is low in the sky and very bright flashing blue to green to blue then red.

i am going back out to watch it.

i have no camera that works so no pics,sorry.
content.summary: Circle multi color

content.detailedDescription:
Driving ne on rt 48 just about 3 miles southwest of morrisonville, i saw an object to my left just ahead of me over a field, almost true north of me.  it was twilight, not quite daylight. the object appeared as a ball of light about the size of a pencil eraser. it appeared to be somewhere around 1000 feet high.  at first i thought it was a star.  i really didn't think much about it.  but as i drove ne, the object appeared to get bigger and to be traveling straight east at a slow rate of speed.  the further i drove, the closer it got to me.  i thought that it would be over morrisonville just about the time i was going through the town.  the light was a solid amber light and as it got closer, i thought i saw a dark egg shaped structure beneath it.  the light was on top.  the light was solid and did not blink at all.  anyway, after observing it for a few miles, it just seemed to disappear.  on moment there. the next moment nothing.  gone. it just vanished. i didn't see it speed off.  it just disappeared.  

it blinked out just before i got to morrisonville.  it was disappointing to me because i was curious what it was and i thought i would get a close up view of it over morrisonville. i wasn't alarmed at all, i was just curious. 

i drove by the spot on my way home this evening during daylight hours.  when i approached the area where i had spotted it this morning, i looked all around for a microwave tower thinking that maybe i had observed one of them this morning.  these towers have a solid light halfway up and a blinking light on the top.  even though i didn't observe any tower structure underneath it this morning, i thought that maybe i could have still possibly seen a tower.  but after scanning the area on my way home, i found that there was no towers anywhere around.  so, i don't know what i saw!
content.summary: Saw a ball of moving light near morrisonville, illinois.

content.detailedDescription:
a short while ago i was siting out side enjoying the night as i so offten do, i saw a pair of lights apear to come out of no where to the west. at first i thought it was a plane but then i notced the lights were the wrong colors and the the object was not moving. i kept my eyes on the object forabout 45 sec's then i call my brother and sister out side to confirm what i was seeing. my sister then pointed out that it was spinning, and it was. shortly after its lights dimmed  and then seem to slowly move to the west towards los angels.The time it was last seen was 7:03 pm pst. so the whole event lasted two maybe three minutes. we live in an dark, hill side area so our vison was great. there has been sightings around this area befor but not for a while. and the great thing is that they have been seen my muliple people and both at night and day times...


our location: la habra heights, harbor blvd./fullerton rd.

object aprox. location: west of my locaton. object seem to in the whittier area...


photos and a short video were taken but it just looks like a dot in the sky. nothing worth posting.
content.summary: Multied colored and spinning

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside for a cig and saw what i though was venus setting just above the trees to the west. it was very red at first, wich i dismissed as refraction due to it inclination. as i watched it the light darted left then right just a few degrees of travel then floated up slowly then floated down. i ran inside to get wife and son and nocs. we watched the light slowly move away from us towards the west untill it dropped below the tree line across the lake behind our house. the tree tops across the lake are about 3 degrees above the true horizon. when i first saw the light it was about 15 degrees above the west horizon.My eyes being what they are the light was starlike and seemed to dance from red to orage then back to red again bright then dim, but thruogh the nocs it looked orb like.Intense burning like a welders arch but red/amber/orange in color.
content.summary: Bright redish orange light movement not typical.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a long time ago, but i have never forgotten it. about the only date i'm sure of, is the year. it was 1961, or 62, summer time. there may have been even a closer town other than san antonio. the place was called timber lake....I remember that much. it used to cost us five dollars for entrance, and we could keep all the fish we caught.  i remember it being a pretty run down place.....Trash everywhere, etc.  we used to roll out our bedrolls up from the shore line, under the mesquite trees, to stay away from waters edge at night because of the water moccassons. (snakes). on this particular night, i remember we were all happy because dad had bought 3 old army cots from the army/navy store, that my brothers and i got to use. we were excited that we didnt have to sleep on the ground, in our "bed rolls". (we were poor, and couldn't afford expensive sleeping bags.)mom and dad and the youngest brother slept on the ground, on a matteress. 

but i remember laying there this night, doing what preteen kids do, when my brother and i noticed a light through the trees that just kept getting brighter and brighter, like lights on a car would as it got closer. it didnt seem to be coming from any one direction, but rather just kind of all around us. and all of a sudden, at the tree top level, there was this huge object that went racing by and over us, like a jet or something. the only noise we heard wa a "whoosh" type sound as it passed, but then all of a sudden again, a gust of really hot, hot wind rustled the trees like a hurricane would, and over tipped our cots. all 3 of them over turned, and we wound up on the ground. mom and dad were sitting up with dad saying what the hell was that....Or something to that effect, i remember.  they told us to go back to bed, and we'd go look for it in the morning.....So, we did. well.....We kind of laid there all night waiting for it to happen again. it didn't of course, but when day light arrived, we took off in the direction it was traveling to see if we could find out where it had crashed.

we didnt find anything, nothing at all. but it was so low when it passed overhead, we were certain it was going to crash somewhere. but, where the only noise we heard was that soft whoosh, and no explosions or anything, we thought too, that maybe it had just landed someplace. i know, my brothers and i didn't fish that next day, as we were out hiking around trying to find this thing. it was huge, and it was fast. once it'd past us, the light we'd seen at first just kind of followed it off behind it.

i've been going to tell some one about this for years....I just didnt know who to tell, nor where to tell it. i guess mufon is the answer to both questions. my brother and i talk about this every now and then......Usually when some one says some thing about ufo's.  it happened....I'll swear on the holy grail, on the bible, to god himself....It happened.  some of the details are kind of sketchy now, but for the most part, thats how it happened. it was 61 or 62, in the summer time i'm pretty sure.....Whereas texas doesnt really have a winter, it very well could have been springtime, or even fall.  i'm just not sure of the time of year.....Like thats going to make a big difference?

honest to god fellas, this happened. i was 10 or 11, and i remember it well. like i said.....I cant tell you what we had for dinner that night, or what color my pants were, but it did happen

[cms/pid/tg] - name removed by cms admin
content.summary: We were camping/fishing.  it flew over us and kept going.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo chased by fighter jet on 1/20/09 florida's space coast:
my wife and i were coming home from the store she was driving i was a passenger. we were traveling west on emerson rd. i saw a very large strangely lite object approaching from the north west. i thought it might be a helicopter at first when it was really far away but as it got closer and turned slightly to cross our path i saw it was not a helicopter. the thing that made me notice it first was it had the wrong colored lights - it had 5 ��� 6 orange- yellow- whitish lights bigger than a plane and arranged in an odd pattern. it didn���t have any blinking lights the lights were on the front and back, 3 ��� 2 respectively. it was very big. as it got closer i said to my wife ���hey that���s not a plane what is that��� she said ���oh my god what is that thing��� as it got closer and passed in front of us you could see a very big octagonal shaped grayish metal big thing for lack of better words. 
at that point my wife got in the left turning lane to make a u turn to follow it, it was moving very slow but than all of a sudden a fighter jet blew by the thing a few hundred feet under it. this thing made no noise at all -- we had the windows open and were leaning out of van to see it ��� you could here the fighter jets engine scream by us - the jet was coming from the south east. at that point we made our u turn to chase the thing but it must have sped up dramatically because up to than it was moving very slow. the fighter jet must have made a u turn also because it went chasing this thing to the south east and it was moving i mean i didn���t even see the jet the second time i just heard the thing scream by our van -- my wife saw it because it was on her side of the van. we tried to follow for a mile or so but they were going to fast and we lost sight of them. 
now i watch the ufo shows and believe in this stuff but this was unreal. i���ve seen lights in the sky before and have always identified them to be a plane or something normal but this was very frightening and just no way this was anything normal. you could see this was not a plane or helicopter or blimp you could see it was very big and all one thing not a bunch of little planes you could see it was a solid grayish metal you could hear it made no noise and you could see this jet could see it also. the reason i am telling you this is because i want to know if anyone else saw this. it was 7:00 pm lots of cars on road.  we see everything here you can watch the space shuttle launch from my driveway ��� nasa shot a rocket up just on saturday. military planes always flying around here. not the little fighter jets but those big ones like tamker planes so i know what all these things look like ��� wish i had a camera with me because that would have been a picture of a ufo not a strange light. one other strange thing and this is probably a coincidence ��� the whole neighborhood had a blackout (power outage) for 30 ��� 45 seconds about 15 minutes after the sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Big - large octagonal - dark grey - heavy looking 5 - 6 whitish lights.

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 6:55 pm/central time(issues with jvm on hln channel was just ending) i walked outside my front door which is facing east and looked south towards dublin because my dog was howling. all the neighbors dogs were also howling. there was still a little bit of red from the setting sun. 
a mile above ground and 2 foot ball field lengths apart were two sets of lights. they were stationary objects and seemed to be right above dublin. from my view they were west of the light tower on hwy 377. each had 3 lights. they flashed from 3 down to only 2 lights, then down to 1 light. then both sets disapeared for 30 seconds then came back on with one light each. then from one light, a 2nd light emmerged, then from the second light a 3rd light emmerged. then both disappeared. i waited for 15 minutes and nothing returned. i did however get grainy video of 2 aircraft(these appeared to be slow moving airplanes or choppers) flying not very far apart away from the objects going north east towards ft. worth. the 2 aircraft circled over stephenville and then back around to dublin.
i also caught view of another low flying airplane with red lights flying to the west. it flew very low and was heading south towards dublin. i noticed because it was very low for a commercial aircraft.
content.summary: 2 sets of 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription:
First seen almost due west of the house, moving but barely so - this morning i surveyed the near area upto 3 miles from point of obsrvation and found no disturbance in the snow within that area - surmise it was further away then it appeared. during 20 minutes of observation moved about 5 degrees from west south west to a more westerly point, before disappearing below a line of hills.

i have previously observed such an occurance in that direction but knowing there are no habitations in that area for more than 10 miles i am confident that they are not in anyway earth bound.
content.summary: Sphere - bright light with red lights at bottom of halo.

content.detailedDescription:
See attachment.


*felt a sense of fiendliness, although i am still shaken up over it*

weather factor not listed: icy roads
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white pulsating light splits into 4 balls of light and one descends hovers and goes back to sky.

content.detailedDescription:
we (my sister in law and i) were laying in a backyard watching for a meteor shower, it was a clear summer night and something went over us and blanked out the stars, it was quiet and slow. it slowly went past and was gone just like that. at first we thought it was a cloud but it was clear that night and a few nights later i saw a cloud and the city lights illuminated it, thats when i knew it wasn't a cloud.
 i cant say much more because we didn't see anything except black. the way this moved over us and blacked out the stars was eerie, i remember we both looked at each other and were puzzled. but didn't think much of it at the time, were were interested in the meteor shower.

 the object moved north to south, very slowly.
content.summary: We were watching for a meteor shower and something went over us and blanked out the stars.

content.detailedDescription: Got up this morning and saw it was lovely outside it had snowed the day before and the scenic shots were beautiful i headed outside the front door to get a picture of this beautiful morning there was not much light around in the morning i took many pictures but in this one something strange came up in the picture i would like to know your professional opinion on this please .
content.summary: Morning view shot with mobile phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from a wild game feed at a local church when i was headed west on road 8 out of lorenzo, nebraska when i noticed what looked like a bright star or planet off to the west. what was odd about this was that there were no other stars visible around it in the night sky. as i approached closer to this object in the west i noticed a new smaller object/light that mysteriously just appears to the south of it. this little star-like object seemed to be twinkling many different colors. the big one was just a bright white orb. at first i thought that perhaps it was mars and venus, or some such normal occuring planet formation in our night sky. but as soon as i noticed the smaller one gaining in altitude more than the larger one that i wasn't any longer looking at stars or planets. the did now appear to be within our atmosphere too. after traveling about eight miles west, i turned south towards my home. at this point i became concerned about the lights because they seemed to now both be flashing or changing colors. the white big one was now turning a light orange color. the smaller one seemed to be coming closer towards my vehicle. i pulled over to see if i could discern anything about them that may seem normal or familiar, like a plane might do. i didn't...They just seemed to be remaining colored lights. the little one even seemed to be moving towards my vehicle like it was targeting it. so, i pulled it out of park and started making my way home at a pretty good speed. the big object now began to turn a redish color and started moving, instead of hanging or hovering where it was. the fact that it changed from orange to red really alarmed me. i pulled up to my house in the country and told my wife to come out side rather quickly so that she could confirm what i had seen. as i was waiting for her, i noticed that the smaller light disappeared and that larger light moved a good distance to the south and began descending toward the red blinking lights of the peetz wind turbine farm. it almost appeared as the red light was trying to mimic or camouflage itself among the wind towers. when i went to look at the big object in my binoculars i was red in the middle and orange on the outside. this object bounced below the horizon to the west and then reappeared for a short few moments and then descended again. at the tail end of this event i started hearing planes overhead that looked like
they might have been military aircraft flying rather slowly as if to be monitoring the area.
content.summary: Bright/strange lights that disappeared near local wind turbine farm.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the inaguration of barack obama on abc news at 11:00 before barack came outside, the camera man caught a glimpse of a large ovular object, that appeard cloudy. and it was moving rather rapidly for a blimp object. the narrators just remained silent, but making a few grunts so as to assume they don't know what the camera man is zeroing into.

it was a 10 second descension and hoverance over the cloud!
content.summary: Watching abc news at 11:00 a huge ufo object was flying over the crowd for 10 seconds; news narrators are speechless, and it made camera man to take another look!.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night when driving to work, less than 2 minutes after getting on the main road i travel on to get to work, i happened to look up off to my left and saw this large oval shaped object that was in the sky. i drove a little slower to get a better view of this object, and it became clear that this object was moving very slowly. i heard no sounds from this object at all. now at this point, i am positive that this wasn't a plane, light tower or a chopper. what was very strange about this large object with a flashing red light in the sky was that it seemed to almost follow me down the main road all the way to work, covering a 2 mile distance. i wondered how this object in the night sky, could have covered so much ground, yet appeared to travel very slowly. looking this object directly with my driver side window down, the light from this moving object was very obvious and bright, still off to my left, slightly northward. at this point, my heart was racing ....It was surely fantastic. i was thinking, "what in the world was i looking at? " 
strangely enough, this light appeared visible even as i neared my work. unfortunately, i had to go to work as i was already late. amazing experience ...Never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Large disc / oval shaped object with red flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
We had hunted near old hopkins town all day.At first dark we were gathering up our deer hounds on south dud rd. and mill rd.I noticed what appeared to be a jet plane on fire coming across swamp from south east to north west.It was moving fast it then turned toward me and suddenly stopped leaned side ways and went down in a clear cut.When it stopped lights (fire) seemed to drip off of it.I saw 6 lights ,heat vents come on as it stopped.It landed or crashed was my first thoughts.In less than 10 seconds it came back up hovered above the trees.At times we could only see a shere like orange fireball.Other times as it turned we could see the shape of a triangle.We watched for 2 hours and left not really understanding it.
we went back the next night to get pictures to see if it might be their.It was in approximate area.We took pictures,but none would show up.
this object was large as a house.It has been seen since many times and may still be in area.
i don't think it's military,but i don't know what it is.
content.summary: Fireball ,sphere and triangle

content.detailedDescription:
My son came to get me after he received several phone call from his friends about seeing a ufo in the sky, and some had seen it the previous night.  it was on the hbccufo.Org sight, and has been taken down since last night.  i went outside, and we watched this thing stay perfectly still, while watching the stars change position, as usual.  it was very cloudy, and this thing was below the clouds.  it brightened to the size of a dime, from our viewpoint, and occasionally dimmed, but only briefly.  it seemed to split and remerge.  after 8:00 i went back out and it was gone. 

i had seen a ufo back in june, so i wasn't suprised at this, but we were uneasy.
content.summary: Bright white light to the west, dimming and brightening, splitting and coming together

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were staying at a hotel in hollywood, ca, as we stood on the balcony facing the east, looking up at the sky we saw (what looked like) two planes that looked as if they were going to crash into each other. only the one on the left that was blinking colored (red blue white) lights suddenly stopped in mid air for a second then reversed in the exact opposite direction that it came from.  it did not turn around -- it just suddenly changed course from the direction it came then speed away toward downtown la.  no craft that i am aware of can stop mid air then change direction so quickly. did anyone else see this??
content.summary: Ufo in the sky in hollywood ca.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight is the 3rd time we have seen this bright light over the last week. it seems to "bounce" up and down, and move side to side. this is much brighter than any star. we have video taped it for 45 minutes, and have photos as well.

have not seen it move quickly, but in the 45 minutes of video, it moved out of frame several times.

1st sighting was at aprox 3:00 am 1-14-09 (video shot)
2nd sighting was at 7:00 pm  1-17-09(photo's taken by neighbor)
3rd sighting was at 7:30 pm 1-19-09

my wife first noticed it during a sleepless night, and woke me to see it, and video tape it. she noticed it looking out our bedroom window. it first looked like a very bright star, but it moved up, and down, and has a blinking light. it is out tonight during a snow storm, with no other stars out.

i first tried to rationalize what i was seeing...Yet what can hang in the sky and move to and fro...What can shine so bright when all the stars are hiding...What planet can leave and return on other days...
content.summary: Bright light low in sky. seeming to move with blinking lights.
